body_html:
Hi everybody,
sorry in advance for the question (I'm new to TF contribtion) but isn't this type - conversion function association already performed by register_tensor_conversion_function() ?

If so the _tensor_conversion_func_registry detail should not be needed: it should be possible to perform the function registration somewhere else in the framework

Thanks

body:
Hi everybody, 
sorry in advance for the question (I'm new to TF contribtion) but isn't this type - conversion function association already performed by `register_tensor_conversion_function()` ? 

If so the `_tensor_conversion_func_registry` detail should not be needed: it should be possible to perform the function registration somewhere else in the framework 

Thanks
